description.zh-cn: 代表中华人民共和国出战各项国际篮球赛事的男子篮球队。
description.en: The men's national basketball team that represents the People's Republic of China in international competitions.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的一个社会主义国家，是世界上人口最多的国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, and the world's most populous country.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的篮球运动管理机构。
description.en: The governing body for basketball in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 国际篮球联合会在亚洲区的分支机构，负责管理亚洲区的篮球事务。
description.en: A zone of FIBA that manages basketball in Asia.

description.zh-cn: 中国篮球运动员和教练，曾担任中国国家男子篮球队主教练。
description.en: A Chinese basketball player and coach, who has served as the head coach of the China men's national basketball team.

description.zh-cn: 中国篮球运动员，曾效力于NBA休斯顿火箭队，被誉为中国男篮“三大中锋”之一和巅峰时期的代表人物。
description.en: A Chinese basketball player who played for the Houston Rockets in the NBA. He is known as one of the 'Three Great Centers' and a representative figure of the national team's peak era.

description.zh-cn: 中国篮球运动员，中国男篮“三大中锋”之一，曾因与中国篮协的矛盾短暂离开国家队。
description.en: A Chinese basketball player, one of the 'Three Great Centers'. He briefly left the national team due to conflicts with the Chinese Basketball Association.

description.zh-cn: 中国篮球运动员和教练，是中国男篮“黄金一代”成员，后担任国家队主教练。
description.en: A Chinese basketball player and coach. He was a member of the 'Golden Generation' and later became the head coach of the national team.

description.zh-cn: 中国篮球运动员和教练，曾担任中国男篮蓝队及合并后国家队的主教练。
description.en: A Chinese basketball player and coach, who served as the head coach of the China national blue team and the unified national team.

description.zh-cn: 中国篮球运动员，在2019年世界杯对阵波兰的比赛中因关键失误而备受批评。
description.en: A Chinese basketball player who received widespread criticism for a crucial turnover in the 2019 World Cup match against Poland.

description.zh-cn: 在中国举办的国际篮球赛事，中国队在该赛事中表现不佳，未能直接获得奥运会资格。
description.en: An international basketball tournament held in China, where the Chinese team performed poorly and failed to directly qualify for the Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 在日本东京举办的夏季奥林匹克运动会，中国男篮37年来首次无缘该赛事。
description.en: The Summer Olympic Games held in Tokyo, Japan. The Chinese men's basketball team failed to qualify for the event for the first time in 37 years.

description.zh-cn: 国际篮球赛事，中国男篮在该赛事中表现不佳，错失2024年巴黎奥运会资格。
description.en: An international basketball tournament where the Chinese men's national team performed poorly, failing to qualify for the 2024 Paris Olympics.

en: South Korea men's national basketball team

description.zh-cn: 代表韩国参加国际篮球比赛的队伍，是中国男篮在亚洲的主要竞争对手之一。
description.en: The national basketball team representing South Korea, one of the main rivals of the Chinese team in Asia.

description.zh-cn: 代表伊朗参加国际篮球比赛的队伍，是中国男篮在亚洲的主要竞争对手之一。
description.en: The national basketball team representing Iran, one of the main rivals of the Chinese team in Asia.

nodes.id: 中华台北男子篮球代表队

zh-cn: 中华台北男子篮球代表队
en: Chinese Taipei men's national basketball team

description.zh-cn: 代表中华台北参加国际篮球比赛的队伍。
description.en: The national basketball team representing Chinese Taipei in international competitions.

description.zh-cn: 代表波兰参加国际篮球比赛的队伍。
description.en: The national basketball team representing Poland in international competitions.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家电视台。
description.en: The state broadcaster of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国篮球运动员，在2019年世界杯后遭到中国中央电视台的点名批评。
description.en: A Chinese basketball player who was singled out for criticism by China Central Television after the 2019 World Cup.

description.zh-cn: 中国篮球运动员，在2019年世界杯后遭到中国中央电视台的点名批评。
description.en: A Chinese basketball player who was singled out for criticism by China Central Television after the 2019 World Cup.

description.zh-cn: 中国国家男子篮球队是代表中华人民共和国出战各项国际赛事的篮球队。
description.en: The China men's national basketball team represents the People's Republic of China in various international competitions.

description.zh-cn: 中国国家男子篮球队由中国篮球协会管理。
description.en: The China men's national basketball team is managed by the Chinese Basketball Association.

description.zh-cn: 中国国家男子篮球队于1974年加入亚洲篮球协会。
description.en: The China men's national basketball team joined FIBA Asia in 1974.

description.zh-cn: 郭士强曾担任中国国家男子篮球队主教练，是现任教练。
description.en: Guo Shiqiang previously served as and is the current head coach of the China men's national basketball team.

description.zh-cn: 姚明是中国男篮巅峰时期的核心球员，直到2011年7月宣布退役。
description.en: Yao Ming was a core player for the Chinese national team during its peak period until he announced his retirement in July 2011.

description.zh-cn: 王治郅因与中国篮协的矛盾，在2002年至2006年期间没有参加国家队的比赛。
description.en: Due to conflicts with the Chinese Basketball Association, Wang Zhizhi did not play for the national team from 2002 to 2006.

description.zh-cn: 2018年9月26日，李楠被聘任为中国男篮主教练，备战2019年世界杯和2020年东京奥运会。
description.en: On September 26, 2018, Li Nan was appointed as the head coach of the Chinese men's national basketball team to prepare for the 2019 World Cup and the 2020 Tokyo Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 2017年，杜锋执教国家男篮拆分后的蓝队。
description.en: In 2017, Du Feng coached the Blue Team after the national team was split.

description.zh-cn: 在2019年世界杯对阵波兰的比赛中，周琦的致命传球失误导致中国队输掉比赛，葬送了领先优势。
description.en: In the 2019 World Cup match against Poland, Zhou Qi's fatal turnover led to China's defeat, squandering their lead.

description.zh-cn: 中国队在2019年世界杯中表现不佳，排位赛成绩落后于伊朗队，首次无法直接晋级奥运会。
description.en: China's poor performance in the 2019 World Cup, finishing behind Iran in the classification round, resulted in their failure to directly qualify for the Olympics for the first time.

description.zh-cn: 中国队在2023年世界杯中错失2024年巴黎奥运会男篮比赛资格。
description.en: The Chinese team failed to qualify for the 2024 Paris Olympics men's basketball tournament at the 2023 World Cup.

description.zh-cn: 韩国队是中国男篮在亚洲赛场上的主要竞争对手，曾在1997年亚锦赛和2002年亚运会击败中国队。
description.en: The South Korean team is a major rival of the Chinese team in Asian competitions, having defeated China in the 1997 Asian Championship and the 2002 Asian Games.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗队在2009年亚锦赛决赛中惨败中国队，成为中国队在西亚的强有力挑战者。
description.en: Iran defeated China heavily in the 2009 FIBA Asia Championship final, becoming a strong challenger to China in West Asia.

relationships.source: 中华台北男子篮球代表队

description.zh-cn: 在2013年菲律宾男篮亚锦赛四分之一决赛中，中国男篮首次负于中华台北队，创下自1975年以来的最差战绩。
description.en: In the quarterfinals of the 2013 FIBA Asia Championship in the Philippines, the Chinese men's team lost to Chinese Taipei for the first time, marking their worst record since 1975.

description.zh-cn: 在2019年世界杯小组赛中，波兰队在加时赛中击败中国队。
description.en: In the 2019 World Cup group stage, Poland defeated China in overtime.

description.zh-cn: 2019年世界杯后，中国中央电视台罕见点名批评周琦等人不具备与世界强队掰手腕的能力。
description.en: After the 2019 World Cup, China Central Television unusually singled out Zhou Qi and others for criticism, stating they lacked the ability to compete with world-class teams.

description.zh-cn: 2019年世界杯后，中国中央电视台罕见点名批评郭艾伦等人不具备与世界强队掰手腕的能力。
description.en: After the 2019 World Cup, China Central Television unusually singled out Guo Ailun and others for criticism, stating they lacked the ability to compete with world-class teams.

description.zh-cn: 2019年世界杯后，中国中央电视台罕见点名批评王哲林等人不具备与世界强队掰手腕的能力。
description.en: After the 2019 World Cup, China Central Television unusually singled out Wang Zhelin and others for criticism, stating they lacked the ability to compete with world-class teams.
